title: jwt_authentication_and_token_refresh
description: Verify that the authentication system correctly handles user login, registration, JWT token issuance, token refresh, and logout functionalities, ensuring secure access control.

title: role_based_access_control_enforcement
description: Test that the system enforces role-based access control (RBAC) rules correctly, restricting or allowing access to APIs based on user roles such as ADMIN, AUDITOR, OPERATOR, and USER.

title: default_customer_crud_and_export
description: Validate the create, read, update, delete (CRUD) operations for default customers, including pagination, search, filtering, and data export functionalities with proper permission checks.

title: default_application_submission_and_approval
description: Ensure that default application submission, listing, detail viewing, and approval workflows function correctly, including batch approval operations and document attachment handling.

title: default_reason_management_crud_and_batch_update
description: Test the management of default reasons including creation, modification, deletion, batch status updates, and filtering by enable status.

title: renewal_application_submission_and_approval
description: Verify the submission, approval, and tracking of renewal applications and renewal reasons, ensuring correct workflow and status updates.

title: statistics_query_and_report_export
description: Test the statistics and analytics module for querying data by industry, region, and trends, and verify the correctness and format of exported reports.

title: user_management_role_assignment_and_status_control
description: Validate administrative user management functionalities including role assignment, permission control, user status management, and password resets.

title: security_notifications_and_event_logging
description: Ensure that security notifications, event logging, and access control mechanisms operate correctly to maintain system security.

title: api_rate_limiting_and_error_handling
description: Verify that the system enforces API rate limiting (up to 100 requests per day per user) and handles errors uniformly with correct HTTP and business status codes.
